DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate efficacy , safety tolerability MTC896 Gel subject acne . In study , MTC896 Gel apply 3 concentration , twice daily ( bid ) 12 week compare vehicle control .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Determine Efficacy Topically Applied MTC896 Gel Subjects With Acne Vulgaris
